<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/groups/{groupKey}/members"}

Add a member to a group. Invalidates all AccessTokens.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
